pageDescription: Dette indhold indeholder realtidsinformation om juridiske tjenester i Spanien

realEstate.title: Vi er eksperter i alle områder relateret til erhvervelse af forskellige typer af fast ejendom
realEstate.description: Vi har viden og ekspertise inden for de juridiske og skattemæssige aspekter relateret til både salg og erhvervelser, samt finansiering og etablering af garantier.

competencies.title: Juridisk rådgivning om fast ejendomstransaktioner
competencies.description: Vi yder ekspert juridisk rådgivning i fast ejendomstransaktioner, herunder juridisk analyse og transaktionsstrukturering.

competencies.title: Skatterådgivning
competencies.description: Vi yder skatterådgivning i forbindelse med erhvervelse og ejerskab af fast ejendom, og hjælper med at optimere klienters skatteansvar.

competencies.title: Finansiering og garantier
competencies.description: Vi yder støtte i finansiering af fast ejendomserhvervelser og etablering af passende garantier.

competencies.title: Risikovurdering
competencies.description: Vi analyserer risiciene ved fast ejendomstransaktioner og giver anbefalinger til at mindske dem.

competencies.title: Kommercielle forhandlinger
competencies.description: Vi deltager i kommercielle forhandlinger med modparter og andre parter i transaktioner.

competencies.title: Transaktionsstøtte
competencies.description: Vi yder fuld juridisk støtte til transaktionsprocessen, herunder forberedelse af dokumenter, indgåelse af kontrakter og registrering af transaktioner.

competencies.title: Finansieringsorganisation
competencies.description: Vi hjælper med at arrangere finansiering af ejendomstransaktioner, herunder at håndtere finansielle institutioner og legalisere transaktioner.

realEstate.commitment: Vi er forpligtet til at sikre, at vores klienter fuldt ud forstår de juridiske og skattemæssige aspekter, der er involveret i erhvervelse af fast ejendom, og giver en omfattende løsning for vellykkede transaktioner.

taxAdvice.title: Skatte-, finans- og regnskabsrådgivning
taxAdvice.description: Vi arbejder med enkeltpersoner og virksomheder, beboere og ikke-beboere, og hjælper dem med deres daglige drift, giver skatteindberetning, skatte- og finansrådgivning samt bogføring og administration.
taxAdvice.optimization: For at optimere vores klients skattesituation og være opmærksomme på behovet for at holde sig ajour med gældende skatte- og regnskabslovgivning på det personlige og erhvervsmæssige område har vi skatterådgivere, der udforsker nye muligheder for skatteoptimering i forskellige situationer.
services: Skatte-, finans- og regnskabsrådgivning for enkeltpersoner og juridiske enheder.
Repræsentation af udenlandske virksomheder i Spanien.
Erklæringer om forpligtelser over for skattemyndighederne for enkeltpersoner og juridiske enheder.
Indkomst- og formueerklæringer for ikke-bosiddende enkeltpersoner.
Repræsentation og gennemførelse af sager for Skattevæsenet.
Forberedelse og legalisering af regnskabsbøger og årsrapporter.
Interaktion med banker, notarer, Ejendoms- og Handelsregistret og andre offentlige myndigheder.

companyAdministration.title: Virksomhedsadministration
companyAdministration.description: Vores tilgang sigter mod at give vores kunder en omfattende løsning for effektiv virksomhedsstyring.
companyAdministration.administrativeServices: Vi tilbyder en række tjenester, herunder betalinger, vedligeholdelse af lejemål, betaling af lokale og statslige skatter, gebyrer, forsikring og andre regninger såsom byggegebyrer, med fuld juridisk, skattemæssig og regnskabsmæssig støtte. Udover disse administrative tjenester yder vi juridisk, skattemæssig og regnskabsmæssig støtte for at sikre overholdelse af alle gældende regler og bestemmelser.

services.title: Carrying out Payments
services.description: Take care of making payments on behalf of administered companies. This may include payments to suppliers, utilities, salaries and other expenses.

services.title: Maintaining Lease Agreements
services.description: We manage and maintain leases on behalf of the company, ensuring that terms and agreements are adhered to.

services.title: Payment of Taxes and Duties
services.description: Assume the obligation to pay local and state taxes and other applicable fees, ensuring compliance with the community's tax obligations.

services.title: Insurance Management
services.description: We handle premium payments and policy issues, ensuring adequate insurance and public protection.

services.title: Other Accounts
services.description: Manage and make payments related to other accounts, such as construction work or other specific society expenses.

laborLaw.title: Labor law
laborLaw.description: Due to the complexity of employment and social security law, Legal Advice on labor issues, whether at the outset, during the course of the employment relationship or at its termination, has become increasingly important from the perspective of both employer and employee. We are committed to providing a full range of employment and social security law services to ensure effective, law abiding employment relationships within an organization.

services.title: Legal advice on labor law and Management of Labor Relations in companies
services.description: Provide expert consulting and management of labor relations in companies, and regulate issues of human resources management.

services.title: Social and Labor Audience
services.description: We carry out social labor audits, providing a comprehensive assessment of the social and labor situation in the organization.

services.title: Postponements
services.description: Our team provides support for tax and contribution deferrals.

services.title: Representation in Labor Courts
services.description: We provide representation in Labor Courts, protecting clients' interests in legal disputes.

services.title: Consolidations
services.description: We assist with conciliation procedures, seeking to resolve labor disputes in an amicable manner.

services.title: Collective Labor Conflicts
services.description: Our team is dedicated to resolving collective labor disputes.

services.title: Regulation of Employment Resolution Procedures (ERES and ERTES)
services.description: We provide services for employment settlement procedures such as collective redundancies and temporary reductions in hours.

services.title: Representation before trade unions / Collective agreements
services.description: We represent clients before labor unions and participate in collective bargaining negotiations.

services.title: Manage payroll, contracts, and more
services.description: We provide payroll management, contract drafting and other labor relations services.

services.title: Process and draft labor contracts and renewals
services.description: We handle the processing and drafting of labor contracts and their renewals.

services.title: Processing of retirement procedures, disability benefits, etc.
services.description: We provide services to process retirement, disability benefits and other aspects of Social Security.

services.title: Alien Migration Issues
services.description: We also provide advice and services on migration aspects for foreign workers.

bankAccount.title: Opening a bank account
bankAccount.description: Opening a bank account in Spain for a non-resident with Property Partners:
bankAccount.content: If you are looking for professional advice and assistance in opening a bank account in Spain as a non-resident, our experts will not only provide you with the information you need, but also provide full support in the account opening process, including collecting all the necessary documents, including sworn translations, and accompanying you to the bank.
bankAccount.difficulty: Due to the tightening of anti-money laundering policies and changes in banking legislation, opening a bank account in Spain for non-residents is becoming increasingly difficult. Successful account opening depends on the loyalty of a particular bank and we offer our expertise to facilitate this process.
bankAccount.support: We cooperate with reliable banks and provide our clients with support at all stages of opening an account in Spain, including:
steps: Consultation on all aspects of the account opening procedure.
Assistance in gathering the necessary documents.
Accompanying you to the bank to sign the bank account agreement.
bankAccount.note: Note: The cost of sworn translations is charged separately.
bankAccount.additionalQuestions: If you have additional questions or need more information, leave a request online and we will contact you shortly for a consultation.
